v0.96.description:
Prehistoric DLC update is finally ready along with a lot of bug fixes and a few of the setup instructions have changed to be a simpler process (not a lot though, mostly the same).

## What's Changed
* added prehistoric planet pack items by @AYaroslavskiy91 in https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/pull/2
* Fixed bug in options parsing by @AYaroslavskiy91 in https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/pull/3

## New Contributors
* @AYaroslavskiy91 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/pull/2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/compare/v0.9...v0.96
v0.96.title: v0.9.6 Prehistoric Update

v0.98.description: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/compare/v0.96...v0.98 I have done so much since this last update I can't even remember all of it. There has been a lot of bugfixes and stability improvements. Latest version now should support all possible mods, most recently support was added for mods that add new Techs (aka Research items) like [Rocketry Expanded](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2837919908) or [Ronivan's Legacy](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3557584850&searchtext=ronivan) I've added a new way of checking if the connection is active. If this says you're disconnected; A notification will appear on the left. New options are added to the config along with this. Auto reconnect is on by default (as it always was). Now that there is a way to reconnect manually in game, this can be turned off if you want. If you start on a Frosty DLC or Prehistoric DLC Planet, the Research Portals are now functional, as in they give you free research as they do in vanilla. 2 buildings for Frosty and 3 for Prehistoric.
v0.98.title: ArchipelagoNotIncluded v0.98

v0.99.description:
Added all new items from the November QoL update.

Made your own Care Packages visible in the Research screen (haven't changed the icon yet, will get to that in the future)

Fixed crash with Change Material button

Possibly fixed crash that rarely happens when finishing Research
v0.99.title: v0.99

v0.9r2.description:
**WARNING:** This update is the first time the world is packed as a .apworld file. If you have previously installed this apworld, you **MUST** uninstall the old one to avoid conflicts.
To do this, navigate to your `Archipelago` installation, find the `lib/worlds` folder and delete the folder called `oni`
From now on, the .apworld file needs to be placed in `Archipelago/custom_worlds`

Tons of new features and bug fixes have been added. Notable differences are new options in the YAML for additional location checks which can be enabled or disabled. Newly discovered resources on your starter planet, and optionally the teleporter connected planet are now location checks. Care packages have been added to fill in items for these new locations. 

Full Support for Bionic DLC has been added including additional logic that is applied.

## What's Changed
* Make the world apworld compatible by @silasary in https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @silasary made their first contribution in https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ShadowKitty42/ONI-Archipelago/compare/v0.85...v0.9
v0.9r2.title: v0.9 Huge Update
